article_title: Relational to Focus on Current Investments During Whitworth's Leave
article_text:
Relational Investors LLC, a $6 billion activist hedge-fund firm, will stop making new investments while co-founder Ralph Whitworth is on medical leave, the firm said Monday.

Relational said it would focus on existing investments but not "initiate" new ones during Mr. Whitworth's leave of absence.

Mr. Whitworth, 58 years old, was...

twitter.description: Relational Investors said it plans to focus exclusively on its current investments and won't initiate new projects during Ralph Whitworth's previously announced leave of absence.
twitter.title: Relational to Focus on Current Investments During Whitworth's Leave
